          <title>
            <string language="en">Browning of apple</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brünieren des Apfels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Brunissement de la pomme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bronzear da maçã</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Brunitura della mela</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αμαύρωση του μήλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El broncear de la manzana</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the surface of an apple turning to brown when exposed in air.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air exposure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Apple</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Oberfläche eines Apfels,
der an Braun wendet, wenn sie in einer Luft herausgestellt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la surface d'une pomme 
se tournant vers le brun une fois exposée en air.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a superfície de uma 
maçã que gira para o marrom quando exposta no ar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la superficie di una 
mela che si gira verso il colore marrone una volta esposta in aria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την επιφάνεια ενός μήλου
που γυρίζει σε καφετή όταν εκτίθεται στον αέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la superficie de una 
manzana que da vuelta al marrón cuando está expuesta en aire.</string>
          </description>
